articles.title: Charlie Kirk, who helped build support for Trump among young people, dies after campus shooting
articles.description:
Kirk died doing what made him a potent political force — rallying the right on a college campus, this time Utah Valley University.

The post Charlie Kirk, who helped build support for Trump among young people, dies after campus shooting appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Charlie Kirk was shot and killed on September 11, 2025, at Utah Valley University.
Kirk was influential in mobilizing young voters for Trump during his political career.
His death may affect conservative youth engagement efforts in Boston and beyond.

articles.title: Here’s how the shooting of Charlie Kirk unfolded
articles.description:
As he answered a question about gun violence, a single shot cracked.

The post Here’s how the shooting of Charlie Kirk unfolded appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Charlie Kirk was shot while discussing gun violence on September 11, 2025.
Witnesses reported hearing a single shot during the event in Boston.
The incident raises concerns about safety at public events in the city.
